It includes the cities of Davao City, Digos in Davao del Sur, Tagum, Panabo and Samal in Davao del Norte. ==Cities of the Metro Davao== Province Metropolitan cities Settlement type Davao del Sur Davao City Davao del Sur, largest city Highly Urbanized city DIGOS CITY Davao del Sur, capital city Component city Davao del Norte Panabo Chartered city of Davao del Norte Samal Chartered city of Davao del Norte TAGUM CITY Davao del Norte, capital city.
